nodes.text: Hull was a male Zabrak worker. During the Cold War he took part in the resettlement initiative on Taris, but eventually informed Governor Leontyne Saresh that he and his men would stop working due to the threat of rakghouls.
Hull is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
